# algorithm

## Summary

Specifies the algorithm used for calculating the hash value.


## Description

An algorithm specifies the algorithm that was used for calculating the hash value.


## Metadata

- name: algorithm
- Nature: ObjectProperty
- Range: HashAlgorithm
